title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-1.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-1.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part establishes the New York State component of the
CO
2

Budget Trading Program, which is designed to reduce
anthropogenic emissions of CO
2, a greenhouse gas, from
CO
2
budget sources in an economically efficient
manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
242-1.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/31/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
